Title: A Murder of Gods
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on the novel by), Michael Green (developed for television by), Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Seamus Kevin Fahey (teleplay by), Michael Green (teleplay by), Bryan Fuller (teleplay by), Maria Melnik (staff writer)
Actors: Ricky Whittle, Emily Browning, Crispin Glover, Bruce Langley
Plot: On the run after the New Gods' show of force, Shadow and Mr. Wednesday seek safe haven with one of Mr. Wednesday's oldest friends, Vulcan, God of the Fire and the Forge.
